enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: The World Conservation Union (IUCN) and UNEP outlined their activities related to the implementation of Article 6.
TUNISIA, with SENEGAL and CANADA, supported designating a climate change day.
BELGIUM offered to host a regional workshop on Article 6 in 2003.
The US cautioned against linking discussion on Article 6 to reporting and financing issues.
A contact group will be convened by Fatu Gaye (Gambia) and Jean-Pascal van Ypersele (Belgium).
